sphere: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d); sqrnorm(y)
ellipse: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d); (apply(range(d), 1e+6 ^ ((lambda-1) / (d-1)))) * (y .* y)
cigar: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d); 1e-6 * sqr(y[1]) + sqrnorm(y[2:d])
tablet: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d); sqr(y[1]) + 1e-6 * sqrnorm(y[2:d])
cigtab: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d); sqr(y[1]) + 1e-3 * sqrnorm(y[2:d-1]) + 1e-6 * sqr(y[d])
rastrigin: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d); sqrnorm(y) + 10 * d - 10 * sum(apply(y, cos(6.28318530717959 * lambda)))
diffpow: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d); sum(apply(y, abs(lambda)) .^ apply(range(d), 2 + 10 * (lambda-1) / (d - 1)))
rosenbrock: var d = dim(x); var y = x*12 - 5 * ones(d); var xm = y[1:d-1]; sqrnorm(ones(d-1) - xm) + 100 * sqrnorm(y[2:d] - xm .* xm)
sharpridge: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10 - 5 * ones(d);  5e-6 +  1e-6 * y[1] + sum(apply(y[2:dim(y)], abs(lambda)) .^ 0.25)
ackley1: var d = dim(x); var y = x*70 - 35 * ones(d); 20.0 - 20.0*(exp(-0.02 * sqrt(sqrnorm(y)/d))) - exp(sum(apply(range(d), cos(6.28318530717959 * y[lambda])))/d) + exp(1.0)
ackley4: var d = dim(x); var y = x*70 - 35 * ones(d); sum(apply(range(d-1), exp(-0.2) * sqrt(y[lambda] * y[lambda] + y[lambda + 1] * y[lambda + 1]) + 3.0 * (cos(2.0*y[lambda]) + sin(2.0*y[lambda + 1])) )) - (-4.591 + 0.000898365841)
alpine1: var d = dim(x); var y = x*20 - 10 * ones(d);		sum(apply(y, abs(lambda*sin(lambda) + 0.1*lambda)))
alpine2: var d = dim(x); var y = x*10;					-prod(apply(y, sqrt(abs(lambda))*sin(abs(lambda)))) + 2.808131180007006^d
biggsexp2: var d = 2; var y = x[1:2] * 20;					log10(sum(apply(range(10), (exp(-0.1*lambda*y[1]) - 5.0 * exp(-0.1*lambda*y[2]) - exp(-0.1*lambda) + 5.0 * exp(-10.0 * 0.1*lambda))^2.0 )) + 1e-10) + 10.0
biggsexp3: var d = 3; var y = x[1:3] * 20;					log10(sum(apply(range(10), (exp(-0.1*lambda*y[1]) - y[3] * exp(-0.1*lambda*y[2]) - exp(-0.1*lambda) + 5.0 * exp(-10.0 * 0.1*lambda))^2.0 )) + 1e-10) + 10.0
biggsexp4: var d = 4; var y = x[1:4] * 20;					log10(sum(apply(range(10), (y[3] * exp(-0.1*lambda*y[1]) - y[4] * exp(-0.1*lambda*y[2]) - exp(-0.1*lambda) + 5.0 * exp(-10.0 * 0.1*lambda))^2.0 )) + 1e-10) + 10.0
boxbetts: var y1 = x[1] * 0.3 + 0.9; var y2 = x[2]*2.2 + 9.0; var y3 = x[3]*0.3 + 0.9;		sum(apply(range(10), (( (exp(-0.1*lambda*y1) - exp(-0.1*lambda*y2) - exp(-0.1*lambda) + exp(-lambda) ) * y3)^2.0)))
brown: var d = dim(x); var y = x*2 - 1 * ones(d);		log10(sum(apply(range(d-1), (abs(y[lambda]))^(sqrt(abs(y[lambda + 1])) + 1.0) + (abs(y[lambda + 1]))^(sqrt(abs(y[lambda])) + 1.0) )) + 1e-10) + 10.0
cosinemixt: var d = dim(x); var y = x*2 - 1 * ones(d);					sum(apply(range(d), 0.1*cos(5 * 3.14159265358979323846*y[lambda]) + y[lambda] * y[lambda] )) + (0.06302*d)
csendes: var d = dim(x); var y = x*2 - 1 * ones(d);					sum(apply(range(d), (y[lambda]^2.0)*(2.0 + sin(1.0/(y[lambda]+1.23e-10)))))
deb1: var d = dim(x); var y = x*2 - 1 * ones(d);					sum(apply(range(d), (sin(5.0 * 3.14159265358979323846 * y[lambda]))^5.0 ))/d + 1.0
dixonprice: var d = dim(x); var y = x*20 - 10 * ones(d);					(y[1] - 1.0)^2.0 + sum(apply(range(d-1), (lambda + 1)*(2.0 * y[lambda+1] * y[lambda+1] - y[lambda])^2.0 ))
eggholder: var d = dim(x); var y = x*1024 - 512 * ones(d);				sum(apply(range(d-1), -(y[lambda + 1] + 47.0)*sin(sqrt(abs(y[lambda + 1] + y[lambda] / 2.0 + 47.0))) - y[lambda] * sin(sqrt(abs(y[lambda] - y[lambda + 1] - 47.0))) )) + 959.640631472179
expfunc: var d = dim(x); var y = x*2 - 1 * ones(d);					1.0-exp(-0.5*sqrnorm(y))
griewank: var d = dim(x); var y = x*200 - 100 * ones(d);				sqrnorm(y)/4000.0 - prod(apply(range(d), cos(y[lambda]/sqrt(lambda)) )) + 1.0
hansen: var y1 = x[1] * 20 - 10; var y2 = x[2]*20 - 10;				sum(apply(range(5),	lambda*cos((lambda-1)*y1 + lambda) )) * sum(apply(range(5), lambda*cos((lambda+1)*y2 + lambda) )) - (-176.54179315016476)
jennrichsampson: var y1 = x[1] * 2 - 1; var y2 = x[2]*2 - 1;				sum(apply(range(10), (2.0 + 2.0*lambda - (exp(lambda*y1) + exp(lambda*y2)))^2.0 )) - (124.36218235561)
mishra1: var d = dim(x); var y = x;									var val = d - sum(apply(range(d-1), y[lambda] ));	(1.0 + val)^val - 2.0
diffpow-centered: var d = dim(x); sum(apply(x, abs(10 * lambda)) .^ apply(range(d), 2 + 10 * (lambda-1) / (d - 1)))
rosenbrock-centered: var d = dim(x); var y = 5 * x; var z = (y + ones(d)); sqrnorm(y[1:d-1]) + 100 * sqrnorm(z[2:d] - z[1:d-1] .* z[1:d-1])
ackley1-centered: var d = dim(x); var y = 20 * x; var a = sum(apply(y, cos(6.28318530717959 * lambda))); 20 - 20 * exp(-0.2 * sqrt(sqrnorm(y) / d)) + 2.718281828459045 - exp(a / d)
beale-centered: var d = dim(x); var o = ones(d-1); var y = 9 * x[2:d] + 0.5 * o; var y1 = 9 * x[1] + 3; var a = (1.5 - y1) * o + y1 * y; var b = (2.25 - y1) * o + y1 * y .* y; var c = (2.625 - y1) * o + y1 * y .* y .* y; sqrnorm(a) + sqrnorm(b) + sqrnorm(c)
weierstrass-centered: sum(apply(x, sin(lambda)^2 + sin(3*lambda)^2/2 + sin(9*lambda)^2/4 + sin(27*lambda)^2/8 + sin(81*lambda)^2/16 + sin(243*lambda)^2/32))
eggholder-variant-centered: var d = dim(x); var y = 10*x[2:d]; var y1 = 10*x[1]; var a = y1 + sin(y1) + 0.5*sin(1.9*y1) + 2.3*sin(3.4*y1); var b = sum(apply(y, lambda + sin(lambda - 0.8*sin(1.3*lambda+3*y1) + 2.6*sin(3.1*lambda-0.8*y1)))); sqrnorm(x) * (1 + sin(a + b)^2)
spiral-centered: var d = dim(x); var y1 = 4 * x[1]; var y = 4 * x[2:d]; sum(apply(y, (lambda^2 + y1^2 - atan(lambda/y1) - 1.57)^2)) + sqrnorm(x)
